DOC.brief_summary: This double-blinded randomized placebo control trial investigate role upstream 80mg Atorvastastin-calcium patient undergo percutaneous intervention acute STEMI .
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate Role Upstream High Dose Statin STEMI
DOC.criteria: 1 . Any patient 25 90 year age admit transferred Western Pennsylvania Hospital Allegheny General Hospital diagnosis STEMI undergoing emergent percutaneous intervention ( PCI ) culprit coronary artery . STEMI define great 1mm ST segment elevation electrocardiogram . 2 . Elevated cardiac biomarkers ( troponinT > 0.03ng/ml , CKMB > 5ng/mL , ck > 170 U/l ) . 1 . Known history liver disease define cirrhosis , alcoholic liver disease , Non alcoholic steatohepatitis , hepatitis cause liver failure . 2 . Renal failure creatinine > 3mg/dL 3 . Known history liver muscle disease rheumatologic myopathy , history myositis , hepatitis , hepatic cancer . 4 . Cardiovascular arrest shock .
